fields.name: out_cnt
fields.desc: adc lvds sampler clock cycle delay

fields.name: rx_dac_gain
fields.desc: dac gain

fields.name: is_10_bit
fields.desc: adc digital length

fields.name: adc_clk_dly
fields.desc: adc lvds sampler clock fractional delay

fields.name: ld_dac_en
fields.desc: Laser dac digital value enable

fields.name: ld_dac_val
fields.desc: Laser dac digital value

fields.name: adc_chb_result
fields.desc: The adc channel B sampled result

fields.name: adc_cha_result
fields.desc: The adc channel A sampled result

fields.name: adc_fco_result
fields.desc: The adc fco sampled result

fields.name: adc_dco_result
fields.desc: The adc dco sampled result

fields.name: adc_spi_wr_en
fields.desc: write 1 to trigger adc spi write

fields.name: adc_spi_rd_en
fields.desc: write 1 to wr_en and rd_en at the same time to trigger adc spi read

fields.name: adc_spi_busy
fields.desc: adc spi interface busy status

fields.name: adc_spi_wdata
fields.desc: The data need to be written to spi of adc

fields.name: adc_spi_wr_len
fields.desc: adc spi write length; when do write, should be 24, when do read, should be 16

fields.name: adc_spi_rdata
fields.desc: adc spi read data

fields.name: rx_dac_spi_wr_en
fields.desc: write 1 to trigger rx_dac spi write

fields.name: rx_dac_spi_busy
fields.desc: rx_dac spi interface busy status

fields.name: rx_dac_spi_wdata
fields.desc: The data need to be written to spi of rx_dac

fields.name: l_adc_spi_rd_en
fields.desc: write 1 to trigger l_adc spi read

fields.name: l_adc_spi_busy
fields.desc: l_adc spi interface busy status

fields.name: l_adc_spi_rdata1
fields.desc: The chb data read back from spi

fields.name: l_adc_spi_rdata
fields.desc: The cha data read back from spi

fields.name: timer_l
fields.desc: The timer LSB. Clock cycles from timer_rst

fields.name: timer_rst
fields.desc: write 1 to reset timer_l and timer_h

fields.name: timer_stop
fields.desc: write 1 to stop timer_l and timer_h

fields.name: timer_h
fields.desc: The timer MSB. Clock cycles from timer_rst
